Subject: Re: I will Survive (Lunarpine goes Motown)

From: cyberwolf4@...

The wolf stumbled again, mech fluid dripping from his jaw,his 
internal injuries had reopened. he had to continue. he could envision 
Shadow Wings grief, he could envision the sight of Deathscythe 
spitting on his spark laughing at Lunarpine for his stupidity. he 
smelled the air, the smell of past battles was growing stronger, he 
figured he was inside the Maximal scanning zone, he hoped the Ark 
could spare a bot to help him back yo the base. he looked to the sky, 
the sky above glittered by the light of the half moon. He looked at 
the half moon and opened his fluidy jaw.

"Howwwwwwlllllll"

He pressed on with the thought of what he'd do when he met up with 
the Pred that did this to him. "I have your scent monster" the words 
echoed through his mind. The wolf had another reason for survival, 
revenge.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine remained in wolf mode as he limped along. he could feel 
> pressure on his internal damage. Slowly he worked his way back 
> towards the Ark, He knew he had to make it back to the ship, he 
> couldn't die in such a stupid pigheaded way. He'd promised Shadow 
> Wing that he'd protect her, The wolf had to make it back. He took 
no 
> pride in his stupidity and he knew that Shadow Wing wouldn't let 
him 
> forget it."Maybe death would be preferable." he thought, he 
laughed, 
> pain shot through his receptors. He wasn't far from Maximal 
scanners 
> now and it wouldn't be long until they could find him. The 
scavengers 
> circled above him, he could hear the preditors in the distance, but 
> this wolf wasn't on the menu.
> 
> He had promises to keep
> 
> And miles to go before he sleeps.
> 
> (Gold star for anyone who can say where I paraphrased.)
